languages.text: "Мы перекрыли выходы из отсека и снизили подачу кислорода в техтуннели до критического минимума — сейчас там нельзя находиться дольше нескольких минут, не потеряв сознание. Ублюдки не могли покинуть плазмапалаты. Они точно где-то здесь". {n}Подобно змее слуги Немезита сбросили кожу. Красный платок — приманка для отвода глаз.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мы перекрыли выходы из отсека и снизили подачу кислорода в техтуннели до критического минимума — сейчас там нельзя находиться дольше нескольких минут, не потеряв сознание. Ублюдки не могли покинуть плазмапалаты. Они точно где-то здесь". {n}Подобно змее слуги Немезита сбросили кожу. Красный платок — приманка для отвода глаз.{/n}

languages.text: "We sealed off the exits and reduced the air supply to the maintenance tunnels to the absolute minimum — now you can't stay in there longer than a few minutes without passing out. There's no way the bastards could have left the plasma chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы перекрыли выходы из отсека и снизили подачу кислорода в техтуннели до критического минимума — сейчас там нельзя находиться дольше нескольких минут, не потеряв сознание. Ублюдки не могли покинуть плазмапалаты. Они точно где-то здесь". {n}Подобно змее слуги Немезита сбросили кожу. Красный платок — приманка для отвода глаз.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We sealed off the exits and reduced the air supply to the technical tunnels down to a critical minimum — now you can't stay in there longer than a few minutes without passing out. There's no way the bastards could have left the plasma chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

"We sealed off the exits and blew paralytic gas through the maintenance tunnels. The bastards couldn't leave the plasma drive chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

There's no way the bastards could have left the plasma chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

"We sealed off the exits and reduced the air supply to the maintenance tunnels to the absolute minimum — now you can't stay in there longer than a few minutes without passing out. There's no way the bastards could have left the plasma chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

languages.text: Wir haben die Ausgänge versiegelt und die Luftversorgung in den Wartungstunneln auf das absolute Minimum reduziert ... da drin wird man jetzt nach wenigen Minuten bewusstlos. Die Bastarde können die Plasmakammern nicht verlassen haben. Sie sind definitiv irgendwo hier drin. {n}Die Diener von Nemesit haben ihre Haut abgelegt wie Schlangen. Der rote Schal ist nur eine Ablenkung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We sealed off the exits and reduced the air supply to the maintenance tunnels to the absolute minimum — now you can't stay in there longer than a few minutes without passing out. There's no way the bastards could have left the plasma chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Wir haben die Ausgänge versiegelt und die Luftversorgung in den Wartungstunneln auf das absolute Minimum reduziert ... da drin wird man jetzt nach wenigen Minuten bewusstlos. Die Bastarde können die Plasmakammern nicht verlassen haben. Sie sind definitiv irgendwo hier drin. {n}Die Diener von Nemesit haben ihre Haut abgelegt wie Schlangen. Der rote Schal ist nur eine Ablenkung.{/n}

languages.text: «Hemos sellado las salidas y reducido el suministro de aire de los túneles de mantenimiento al mínimo absoluto: ahora es imposible estar ahí poco más de unos minutos sin desmayarse. No hay forma de que esa escoria haya salido de las cámaras de plasma. Tienen que estar por aquí, en alguna parte». {n}Como serpientes, los sirvientes de Nemesitio han abandonado su piel. La bufanda roja no es más que una distracción.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We sealed off the exits and reduced the air supply to the maintenance tunnels to the absolute minimum — now you can't stay in there longer than a few minutes without passing out. There's no way the bastards could have left the plasma chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Hemos sellado las salidas y reducido el suministro de aire de los túneles de mantenimiento al mínimo absoluto: ahora es imposible estar ahí poco más de unos minutos sin desmayarse. No hay forma de que esa escoria haya salido de las cámaras de plasma. Tienen que estar por aquí, en alguna parte». {n}Como serpientes, los sirvientes de Nemesitio han abandonado su piel. La bufanda roja no es más que una distracción.{/n}

languages.text: 「私たちは出口を封鎖し、管理トンネルへの空気供給を極限まで減らしました。今の状況では、気絶するまでに数分もかからないでしょう。奴らがプラズマ室から出られるはずがありません。奴らは間違いなくこのどこかにいます」{n}蛇のように、ネメサイトのしもべたちは脱皮した。赤いスカーフは目くらましにすぎない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We sealed off the exits and reduced the air supply to the maintenance tunnels to the absolute minimum — now you can't stay in there longer than a few minutes without passing out. There's no way the bastards could have left the plasma chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは出口を封鎖し、管理トンネルへの空気供給を極限まで減らしました。今の状況では、気絶するまでに数分もかからないでしょう。奴らがプラズマ室から出られるはずがありません。奴らは間違いなくこのどこかにいます」{n}蛇のように、ネメサイトのしもべたちは脱皮した。赤いスカーフは目くらましにすぎない。{/n}

languages.text: “我们封锁了出口，将维修隧道的空气供应降到了最低限度，只要在里面呆上几分钟就会憋晕过去。那群人渣不可能从等离子驱动室里逃掉，他们肯定还藏在这里的某个地方。”{n}涅墨斯特的仆人像蛇一样蜕掉了皮，那些红头巾不过是用来转移注意力的幌子而已。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We sealed off the exits and reduced the air supply to the maintenance tunnels to the absolute minimum — now you can't stay in there longer than a few minutes without passing out. There's no way the bastards could have left the plasma chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们封锁了出口，将维修隧道的空气供应降到了最低限度，只要在里面呆上几分钟就会憋晕过去。那群人渣不可能从等离子驱动室里逃掉，他们肯定还藏在这里的某个地方。”{n}涅墨斯特的仆人像蛇一样蜕掉了皮，那些红头巾不过是用来转移注意力的幌子而已。{/n}

languages.text: « Nous avons condamné les issues et réduit au strict minimum l'alimentation en oxygène des tunnels de maintenance. Désormais, il est impossible d'y rester plus de quelques minutes sans perdre connaissance. Ces ordures n'ont pas pu quitter les salles des réacteurs à plasma. Ils sont forcément quelque part dans le coin. » {n}Tels des serpents, les serviteurs de Némésite ont mué. Le foulard rouge n'était qu'une diversion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We sealed off the exits and reduced the air supply to the maintenance tunnels to the absolute minimum — now you can't stay in there longer than a few minutes without passing out. There's no way the bastards could have left the plasma chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons condamné les issues et réduit au strict minimum l'alimentation en oxygène des tunnels de maintenance. Désormais, il est impossible d'y rester plus de quelques minutes sans perdre connaissance. Ces ordures n'ont pas pu quitter les salles des réacteurs à plasma. Ils sont forcément quelque part dans le coin. » {n}Tels des serpents, les serviteurs de Némésite ont mué. Le foulard rouge n'était qu'une diversion.{/n}

languages.text: "Çıkışları kapattık ve bakım tünellerindeki hava teminini olabilecek en düşük seviyeye çektik. Artık insanın kendinden geçmeden bu tünellerde birkaç dakikadan fazla kalması mümkün değil. Şerefsizler plazma odalarından ayrılmış olamaz. Buralarda bir yerlerde oldukları kesin." {n}Nemezit'in hizmetkârları, yılan misali deri değiştirmiş. Kırmızı atkı, yalnızca dikkat dağıtma şekilleri.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We sealed off the exits and reduced the air supply to the maintenance tunnels to the absolute minimum — now you can't stay in there longer than a few minutes without passing out. There's no way the bastards could have left the plasma chambers. They are definitely in here somewhere." {n}Like snakes, the servants of Nemesite have shed their skin. The red scarf is just a distraction.{/n}
